mapper.insert: insert into Member (id, passwd, name, phone, type) values (#{ id }, #{ passwd }, #{ name }, #{ phone }, #{ type })
mapper.select: select sf.savedfilename from host h, space s, spacefile sf where h.hostNo = s.hostNo and s.spaceno = sf.spaceno and sf.flag = 1 and h.hostNo = #{ hostNo } and rownum = 1
select loseNo, title, content, loseDate, hostNo, type, uploader from lose where uploader = #{ uploader } and type like '분실물'
select name, ok, type, address, hostNo, hostId, holiday, openStart, openEnd from Host where hostNo = #{ hostNo } order by hostNo desc
mapper.delete: delete from Member where id = #{ id }
